message.content:
cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IR. 

The paper deals with scene text recognition, which is a computer vision task, hence cs.CV is the most likely sub-category. The paper also discusses the use of attention mechanisms and graph convolutional networks, which are commonly used in natural language processing and machine learning, hence cs.CL and cs.LG are also likely sub-categories. The paper proposes a new training method for the CTC decoder, which is a specific algorithm used in sequence labeling tasks, hence cs.AI and cs.IR are also possible sub-categories.
